      • putImage

        public java.lang.String putImage(java.lang.String theFolder,
                                 java.lang.String theImageName,
                                 android.graphics.Bitmap theBitmap)
        Saves 'theBitmap' into folder 'theFolder' with the name 'theImageName'
        Parameters:
        theFolder - the folder path dir you want to save it to e.g "DropBox/WorkImages"
        theImageName - the name you want to assign to the image file e.g "MeAtLunch.png"
        theBitmap - the image you want to save as a Bitmap
        Returns:
        returns the full path(file system address) of the saved image

      • putImageWithFullPath

        public boolean putImageWithFullPath(java.lang.String fullPath,
                                    android.graphics.Bitmap theBitmap)
        Saves 'theBitmap' into 'fullPath'
        Parameters:
        fullPath - full path of the image file e.g. "Images/MeAtLunch.png"
        theBitmap - the image you want to save as a Bitmap
        Returns:
        true if image was saved, false otherwise
